bibdata.title: IEEE Standard of Performance and Test Requirements of Instrument Transformers of a Nominal Voltage of 115 kV and Above
IEEE Standard of Performance and Test Requirements of Instrument Transformers of a Nominal Voltage of 115 kV and Above

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard covers the test requirements, including test sequences, criteria, methods, and documentation for instrument transformers of 115 kV nominal system and above. It is to be used a supplement to IEEE STD C57.13-1993. Besides the provision of up-to-date test requirements, the trial-use standard also provides test procedures that were not adequately covered in the previous standard.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibitem.formattedref: IEEE Std C57.13.5-2009 (Revision of IEEE Std C57.13.5-2003)
